about_the_game:
Anto, who spends her days languidly doing nothing, is a tavern owner who privately conducts her own secret research with her knowledge of science in a different world.
Because of an accident, a ignorant little girl with white hair broke into her life, the original quiet gone forever.
She is forced to take an involuntary risk, and the truth of the world is revealed to her again, bit by bit...
The story of reckoning with the past and saving the future begins.
detailed_description:
Anto, who spends her days languidly doing nothing, is a tavern owner who privately conducts her own secret research with her knowledge of science in a different world.
Because of an accident, a ignorant little girl with white hair broke into her life, the original quiet gone forever.
She is forced to take an involuntary risk, and the truth of the world is revealed to her again, bit by bit...
The story of reckoning with the past and saving the future begins.

name: 大科学家 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)，Windows 10 and Windows 11，仅限64位版本
  • Processor: X64 架构（支持 SSE2 指令集）
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 显存1GB及以上，支持 shader model 4.0（DX10）功能的显卡
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 能出声就行
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel
